tests.description:
Reset the box-sizing property to the more friendly border-box value.
Prevent iOS and IE text size adjust after device orientation change, without disabling user zoom.
Remove all margins, paddings, and borders, does not include the <input>, <button> and <textarea> elements.

The <html> and <body> elements can be tested within the <iframe> element. To improve readability <br> elements are used between each inline element.

tests.description:
Add the correct box sizing in Firefox.
Show the overflow in Edge and IE.
Add the correct display in IE 9-.

Remove the grey background colour from active links in IE 10.
Remove gaps in links underline in iOS 8+ and Safari 8+.
Remove the outline on focused links when they are also active or hovered in all browsers.

Remove the bottom border in Firefox 39-.
Add the correct text decoration in Chrome, Edge, IE, Opera, and Safari.
Add the correct font weight in Chrome, Edge, and Safari.
Add the correct font size in all browsers.
Add the correct font size in all browsers.
Prevent <sub> and <sup> affecting line height in all browsers.

Correct the inheritance and scaling of font size in all browsers.
Correct the odd em font sizing in all browsers.
